title: Southern Girl City Lights
lyrics:
You, that Tennessee breeze
♪

City Lights but there's no place like ho oo oo home

Uh, I'm lookin' at the mo oo on

Over the sky-y-y-y line
I'm a Southern Girl (Southern Girl)

No matter where I go (matter where I go)
I keep my head on right (keep my head on right)

I still look up (still look up)
With stars in my eyes (in my eyes)
'Cause I'm a Southern Girl (Southern Girl)
City Lights but there's no place like ho oo oo home
